NebulaTableUtils.MenuItemLabel.SortAscen.comment: label for menu item to sort ascending.

NebulaTableUtils.MenuItemLabel.SortDesce.comment: label for menu item to sort descending.

NebulaTableUtils.MenuItemLabel.Search.comment: label for menu item to search in field.

NebulaTableUtils.MenuItemLabel.Selection.comment: label for selections menu in field.

NebulaTableUtils.MenuItemLabel.SelectAll.comment: label for select all items in field.

NebulaTableUtils.MenuItemLabel.SelectPos.comment: label for select possible items in field.

NebulaTableUtils.MenuItemLabel.SelectAlt.comment: label for select alternative items in field.

NebulaTableUtils.MenuItemLabel.SelectExc.comment: label for select excluded items in field.

NebulaTableUtils.MenuItemLabel.ClearSele.comment: label for clearing all selected items in field.

NebulaTableUtils.MenuItemLabel.AdjustCol.comment: label for adjust column size menu in field.

NebulaTableUtils.MenuItemLabel.ColumnOpt.comment: aria label for the button in the header that opens the column menu
